Character

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Inventory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterInventory, ChestInventory

    public abstract class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for the inventory. houses some methods that will be in both child classes.
